Articles.Content:
this liquides me off so loveing much its unbelievable, why the game doesnt just work when i loveing download it baffles me, i dont have time to be trouble shooting and looking for answers because i have to go to work, all i want to do is loveing play the game, is that so loveing much to ask

hgmnbjhgmnb v

that was me slamming my keyboard, sorry for the professionalism but when things dont work when they should it liquides me off
This does indeed sound frustrating, and sorry you're not enjoying the game so far. Could you give folks that might help some details, though? System and operating system, and that sort of thing.
